Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1030.jpg'}
{3: 'Bridget leans back in the twilight, her shadow elongated and polished by the warm glow.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Back where I came from, we call this time the "witching hour." It\'s when spirits are most likely to appear, and when humans and ghosts can exist in the same space.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Why are you being so quiet? Are you scared? Don't worry, I'm right here with you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Rest assured, though, that I'm gonna give people a real piece of my mind today if they show up and mess with us.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bridget gives her nose bridge a suave brush, grinning as she wraps an arm around your shoulder.'}
{3: 'Taking a bite of the cotton candy Bridget has offered you, you end up with white sugar all over your face.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "Hahaha, you look ridiculous when you eat. So, mind telling me what we're doing here today?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Trying to stay composed, Yata keeps her hands behind her back while rubbing her running shoes against the ground.'}
{3: "You hand her the voucher you've been holding and explain that it's part of a special holiday event WGAA has organized."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'They... are gonna make you do three laps around the city...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'A piece of cake that is.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'You probably want to take a closer look at it.', 3: '24', 4: "You're missing the first half of what it says.", 5: '24'}
{3: 'Yata focuses her attention on the voucher and reads out what it says.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Challenge... Hold Hands... Around the City... And Run Three Laps.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Wait... seriously?', 4: '1'}
{2: "What's wrong?", 3: '29', 4: "You don't want to do it?", 5: '29'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Not at all. It's just holding hands. Not gonna back down at all.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Feel free to choose from all the mechanical hands I have.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "I mean I could just carry you and do the laps? That's not against the rules, technically speaking...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Thanks but no thanks.', 3: '34', 4: "That's so weird!", 5: '34'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'I could throw you and have you land with centrifugal force like a parabolic trajectory...', 4: '1'}
{2: "Let's just hold hands.", 3: '37', 4: 'Definitely not gonna happen!', 5: '37'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Well, if you don't mind all the eyes on us... then fine.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest01.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest02.prefab'}
{3: 'Yata is usually fine with physical contact, but she now looks awkwardly bashful as she gives you her hand. The moment you take her hand, she starts running without saying a word.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "【kuroname】, things are gonna be real bad if you don't keep up! I'm gonna drag you and...", 4: '1'}
{3: "As she runs, Yata seems to grow more comfortable under her skin. She's now feeling comfortable enough to turn around every now and then to check on you."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'One more lap to go, 【kuroname】! Come on, you can do it!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Keeping up with a Construct's speed without exoskeleton assistance is practically impossible, but thankfully Yata is deliberately holding back a bit."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest02.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab'}
{3: 'Yata half-drags you the whole way and still blazes through the three-lap run. You only manage to endure it thanks to sheer military resolve and discipline.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory802.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'WGAA Staff Member', 3: 'Congratulations on completing the challenge! Please claim your prize! Good job, guys!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'WGAA Staff Member', 3: 'I saw it all! You two held your hands the whole time, which says a lot!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Thankfully, no one saw it when Yata was dragging you so fast that you were practically flying.'}
{3: "The staff member from WGAA hands over your prize with a motherly warm smile. It's an elegantly packaged chocolate."}
{3: "After the run, your stomach is growling with hunger. Just as you're about to tear open the packaging, Yata stops you."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Hold your horses there.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Here, take this instead. Take it.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'You take the small bag of treats Yata tosses to you and catch a sweet aroma you know by heart.'}
{3: "I see. This is chocolate, and it's handmade, too."}
{2: 'You made these?', 3: '80', 4: 'This... is for me?', 5: '80'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "I mean... Valentine's Day is all about showing your appreciation to people you care about, right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Whether you see it as just a friendly gesture or something more... that's up to you. J-just so you know, I only made these for you.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Yata', 3: "Be warned, though, that I'm not great at this kind of thing. I tried several times, but they still look pretty average and nowhere near as nice as what you'd find in shops...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "...But I'm sure they taste great.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'But, woah, what a day! Guess I should have trained myself a little harder!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Says Yata as she lets out a little whine while ruffling her short hair.'}
{3: 'You take a piece of her handmade chocolate from the bag and, very ceremoniously, place it in your mouth.'}
{3: 'Yata watches your every move intently while holding her hands together in anticipation of your verdict.'}
{3: "Yata's face looks red... and you can't be sure if it's because of the sunset, or if you're just seeing things."}
{2: "It's delicious.", 3: '93', 4: 'I can taste all the hard work you put into making these chocolates.', 5: '93'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Sweeter than marshmallows?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Better than takoyaki?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Okay.', 3: '98', 4: 'Everything you make is delicious.', 5: '98'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Hah... that's good to hear. Why does this feel like more of a cardio workout than actual running...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Yata is smiling again as the two of you stroll together through the city. She fidgets with the chocolate in her hands, her thoughts drifting slightly.'}

{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Back in the day at Misono High, students put their hearts into making homemade sweets for their crushes before holidays. Everyone was so into it... but I never had the chance to join in.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'But I finally got a chance to do this myself, and now I know exactly how they felt when they pulled all-nighters making sweets for people they cared about.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'There are countless moments in my life I wish I could redo...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "And once again, it's you who helps fill those gaps in my life, 【kuroname】.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "But crying over spilled milk doesn't help, I guess.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She refreshes herself with a quick rub of her face, then turns to you with another invitation.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'We still have some time left. Want to go somewhere special? Just the two of us, where no one will disturb us?', 4: '1'}
